messages.content:
Rot-12 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 12 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-12.

Rot-12 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 12 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-12.

Rot-12 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 12 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-12.

Rot-12 is a cipher in which each letter is shifted 12 positions forward in the alphabet. Encode the following message into rot-12.
